title.v: Truy vấn, xác nhận đặt hàng

footer.v: 0 - Không hoạch định, 1 - Rời rạc, 2 - Cỡ lô, 3 - Cố định kỳ đặt hàng
footer.e: 0 - None, 1 - Discrete, 2 - Fixed Order Q'ty, 3 - Period Order Q'ty

command.text:
declare @periodCode char(2), @periodName nvarchar(128), @d smalldatetime
select @periodCode = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ky_hd_nd' select @periodName = case when @@language = 'v' then ten_ky else ten_ky2 end from mdmky where ma_ky = @periodCode select @d = run_date from mrlog select @d = isnull(@d, getdate())
select 'this._date=''' + convert(varchar(8), @d, 112) + ''';this._periodCode=''' + @periodCode + ''';this._periodName=''' + isnull(rtrim(replace(replace(@periodName, '\', '\\'), '''', '\''')), '') + '''; set$Form$DefaultValue(this);' as message return

action.text: if exists(select 1 from dmvt where ma_vt = @ma_vt) begin declare @drun smalldatetime, @nStockOnHand numeric(19, 3) select @drun = run_date from mrlog select @nStockOnHand = ton_kho from mrctvtky where ma_vt = @ma_vt and ky = 0 select @nStockOnHand = isnull (@nStockOnHand, 0) select rtrim(a.dvt) as dvt, b.ten_dvt%l, a.nhieu_dvt, ten_loai_vt%l, kieu_hd, ton_at, co_lo, so_ngay_dh, tg_th, vung_hd, @nStockOnHand as ton_kho, @drun as ngay_tinh from dmvt a left join dmdvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt left join dmloaivt c on a.loai_vt = c.ma_loai_vt where a.ma_vt = @ma_vt return end

declare @n int, @i int, @h nvarchar(4000), @d smalldatetime select @d = run_date from mrlog select @d = isnull(@d, getdate()), @h = '' select @n = val from options where name = 'm_so_ky_hd' select @i = 1 while (@i <= @n) begin select @h = @h + convert(varchar(10), dbo.mf_GetDOP(@ma_ky, @d, @i, 1), 103) + ',' set @i = @i + 1 end select @n as p, @h as h return
